description: From a series of 12 lithographs produced for Der Mantel (The Coat) by Nicolai Gogol, Kiepenheuer Verlag, Potsdam-Berlin, 1919; two claw-like hands and the top of a head in the lower right corner of the image
inscription: LLC of sheet, in pencil: Probedruck. / E.62-II-A | URC of sheet, in pencil: 8 | LLC of sheet in pencil, on verso: 1963 / 12176 | LRC of sheet in pencil, on verso: 106.--
portfolio: From Plate 8 from Der Mantel (The Coat), Nicolai Gogol, Kiepenheuer Verlag, Potsdam-Berlin, 1919
signed: LR in pencil, below image: Walter Gramatté / 18 | LL in pencil, below image: Zu Gogol : der Mantel.
title: Two Ghostly Hands Groping for Something, Plate 8 from Der Mantel (The Coat)
